item.description:
Many of us had the wonderful opportunity to join in the interactive high-content training TELE-Meetup with Michael Losier on Tues, 9/29. Michael is an expert Law of Attraction trainer, best-seller author and radio host.

Here's a recording of his TELE-training with us on Tues, 9/29. We strongly recommend that you listen to this recording before you meetup with us on Tuesday.
http://www.audioacrob...

Michael informed us that the most immediate follow-up action to take after attending his training session is to take the time to sit down and do the "clarity through contrast" exercise. How many of us intend to do this, yet we get caught up in the busy-ness of our lives, and we never get going on this very critical first step of deliberate creation?

Join us at our October get-together and let's support each other in putting into action this "clarity through contrast" first-step process of Michael Losier's three-step process for deliberate attraction.

Furthermore, youâ€™ll get to listen (via CDs** we have) of Michael Losier training you steps 2 and 3 of his three-step process for deliberate attraction. (**Additional info not found in his book. )

Added bonus: What you clarify you want -- are they really aligned harmoniously with your core values? You might be surprised. You are most fulfilled when your intentions and activities are aligned with your core values. Clarifying your core values can help you in shaping your purpose and vision. Come discover!

David Buck and Chew-Hoong Koh, the co-organizers of the BostonLOA Meetup, will be the facilitators.

***************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming!
We usually provide handouts and have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this and we very much appreciate your understanding and support!


***************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here:http://lawofattractio...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Put Into Action Michael Losier's Three-Step Process for Deliberate Attraction
